tool_description: Evaluates ticket urgency and impact to assign appropriate priority levels for SLA management.

customer_tier.description: Customer tier level (bronze, silver, gold, platinum)

error_messages: Ticket not found: The provided ticket_id does not exist.
Invalid customer tier: Use one of [bronze, silver, gold, platinum].
Invalid impact level: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Invalid urgency level: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Negative order value: Order value must be zero or positive.
usage: Provide ticket details including customer tier, category, impact, and urgency to calculate appropriate priority level and response targets.
